projects.title: Kindergarten
projects.description: This website is a kindergarten management system that allows families and schools to easily follow children's life, learning and health processes.

projects.title: Kizukai
projects.description: A data analysis website that supports CRM activities (business, lender and customer relationships) and LTV (pre-approval loan risk assessment).
projects.technology: Redux, TypeScript , Graphql, Storybook,  Ruby on rails.

projects.title: T-Learning
projects.description: This website is a system for student programming courses to share programming skills through blogs.
